Name: OFPXMT_OFB_IN_PORT
Description: Ingress port. Numerical representation of incoming port, starting at 1. This may be a physical or switch-defined logical port.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_IN_PHY_PORT
Description: Physical port. In ofp_packet_in messages, underlying physical port when packet received on a logical port.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_METADATA
Description: Table metadata. Used to pass information between tables.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_ETH_TYPE
Description: Ethernet type of the OpenFlow packet payload, after VLAN tags.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_VLAN_VID
Description: VLAN-ID from 802.1Q header. The CFI bit indicates the presence of a valid VLAN-ID.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_IP_DSCP
Description: DiffServ Code Point (DSCP). Part of the IPv4 ToS field or the IPv6 Traffic Class field.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_IP_ECN
Description: ECN bits of the IP header. Part of the IPv4 ToS field or the IPv6 Traffic Class field.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_IPV4_SRC
Description: IPv4 source address. Can use subnet mask or arbitrary bitmask.

Name: OFPXMT_OFB_IPV4_DST
Description: IPv4 destination address. Can use subnet mask or arbitrary bitmask.
